name: 資訊理論與編碼技巧
description:
1. Basics of information theory
2. Lossless compression techniques
3. Lossy compression techniques
4. Multimedia data compression techniques
5. Overview of coding standards
goals: 使學習者認識現今的資訊理論
使學習者認識現今的編碼技巧
syllabus:
Week 1 – Course introduction: goals and requirements  
Week 2 – Introduction to the concepts of image, video and audio  
Week 3 – Rate distortion lossless compression concept  
Week 4 – Source coding  
Week 5 – Huffman codes & Arithmetic coding  
Week 6 – Dictionary codes and Lempel-Ziv coding  
Week 7 – Transform coding  
Week 8 – Discrete cosine transform & image data compression  
Week 9 – Still image compression  
Week 10 – Mid-term exam  
Week 11 – Entropy, relative entropy and mutual Information  
Week 12 – Channel and channel capacity (1/2)  
Week 13 – Channel and channel capacity (2/2)  
Week 14 – Vector quantization coding  
Week 15 – Motion estimation for video coding standards  
Week 16 – An overview of video coding standards (1/2)  
Week 17 – An overview of video coding standards (2/2)  
Week 18 – Final oral report

methodologies.note: 講解現今多媒體資訊理論的發展與應用。
